value: Spell that removes all curses from a target.

value: Spell that causes the target to receive less damage from a specific type of damage.
title: Reactive Armor

value: Spell that revives a dead creature. It cannot be an undead when it died. The target is not well until it has a long rest.
title: Data Recovery

value: Spell that reverses gravity within a fifty foot radius.
title: Inverse Graviton

value: Spell that can revive a creature that has died in the last minute. It does not restore missing body parts.
title: Revivification Serum

value: Spell that levitates an end of a chain. The chain leads to a portal that opens into extradimensional space. Creatures can climb into this space and become immune to spells and attacks.
title: Chain Link

value: Spell that creates a flame-like radiance around a creature that the caster can see. The target takes radiant damage.
title: Fire Sale

value: Spell that wards a creature within range. Any attacks or spells targeted against this creature can be redirected at another opponent or be nullified completely.
title: Honeypot

value: Spell that shoots three friery rays at targets that cause fire damage.
title: Solar Panel

value: Spell that allows the caster to see and hear any target on the same plane of existence. The effectiveness of the spell depends on how well the caster knows the target and if they have any personal affects of the target.
title: Hack Webcam

value: Spell that causes the caster's attack to have additional fire damage.
title: Searing Hack

value: Spell that allows the caster to see invisible creatures and see into the digital plane.
title: Night Vision

value: Spell that changes the appearance of a number of creatures with illusion. The appearance must have the same basic arrangement of limbs, but can look like anything.
title: Image Generator

value: Spell that sends a short message telepathically to a creature that the caster has met before.
title: Electronic Mail

value: Spell that causes the target or an object to become invisible and can't be targeted by divination, detected by magic, or viewed remotely. The target is made unconcious and doesn't age or need food. This lasts until a trigger is called.
title: Time Shift

value: Spell that allows the caster to shapeshift into another creature. The caster keeps their mind and the ability to talk.
title: Gene Editor

value: Spell that creates a loud noise in a sphere. Creatures inside the sphere take thunder damage.
title: Hadron Collider

value: Spell that creates an invisible barrier that protects the user from some physical damage.
title: Malware Blocker

value: Spell that creates a shimmering field which gives the target increased defense.
title: Echo Chamber

value: Spell that allows the caster to use their electronic ability instead of strength to attack with a weapon.
title: Download Specs

value: Spell that allows the caster to attack and add radiant damage to the blow.
title: Shiny Hack

value: Spell that causes lightning damage from the touch of the caster.
title: Short Circuit

value: Spell that creates a spherical space where no words can be spoken and no sounds can be heard. This prevents magic that requires speech.
title: Noise Cancelling

value: Spell that creates an illusionary image. It can be moved, but it is not accompanied by an appropriate smell or sound.
title: Muted Graphic

value: Spell that makes a copy of a creature out of wires, sheet metal, and spare parts. It then follows the caster's commands and is functionally like the original.
title: Mecha Maker

value: Spell that causes the target to become unconcious. The condition ends if the target is damaged or awoken by another creature.
title: Sleep Pill

value: Spell that conjures sleet in the area of a cylinder. The terrain becomes difficult to navigate and creatures are knocked prone.
title: Air Conditioner

value: Spell that causes targets to move slower, resulting in targets being able to do less actions and be susceptible to attacks.
title: Degreaser

value: Spell that shoots energy at a creature. It takes damage of a type that the caster chooses. There is a chance that additional damage is added.
title: Atomic Energy

value: Spell that stabilizes a creature that is on death's door.
title: Triage Cell

value: Spell that allows the caster to communicate fully with drones.
title: Speak with Drones

value: Spell that allows the caster to ask up to five questions to a corpse which will animate and respond according to what it knew in life.
title: Neuromancer

value: Spell that allows the caster to ask simple questions to robots or computers in a thirty foot range. The machines can also follow commands and even open impassible doors.
title: Machine Code

value: Spell that allows a willing target to be able to move accross walls and ceilings without using their hands.
title: Electro-Adhesion

value: Spell that sprouts spiky growth in a twenty foot range that is hard to traverse and causes piercing damage.
title: Spike Bumps

value: Spell that conjures good or evil nanobots that slows and causes radiant or necrotic damage to any creatures that enter a fifteen foot range.
title: Micro Machines

value: Spell that creates a floating, spectral weapon that obeys the caster's commands. It can move independently and attack opponents. It can take the shape of any form of any melee weapon.
title: Light Form Weapon

value: Spell that adds additional psychic damage to an attack. It has a chance to stun an opponent.
title: Syntax Error

value: Spell that launches a mote of light at a creature. It takes radiant damage and emits dim light.
title: EM Shot

value: Spell that makes the caster vanish and then strike like the wind against up to five opponents. They each take force damage. Then the caster is teleported next to one of the opponents.
title: Blink Boots

value: Spell that creates a nauseating gas around a point. It causes creatures to be poisoned and not be able to take action for a short time.
title: Trash Compacter

value: Spell that can transform stone into any shape including weapons, passage ways, doors, or simple locks.
title: Magneto Shape

value: Spell that transforms the target's skin so that it has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
title: Kevlar Skin

value: Spell that creates a storm that causes thunder damage against creatures in its area. It progresses to rain acid, strike lightning, cast hailstones, and eventually blow freezing wind.
title: Static Storm

value: Spell that allows the caster to suggest a course of action that a creature will follow. It has to be short and achieveable.
title: Inception

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon an abberation that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Gel Construct

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a drone that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Drone

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon an alien that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Alien

value: Spell that creates a robot that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Robot

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a cyborg that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Cyborg

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a swarm of nanobots that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Nanoswarm

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a dimensional alien that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Dimensional

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a rogue AI that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Daemon Process

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a nano zombie that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Necro

value: Spell that creates a beam of sunlight that blinds enemies and causes radiant damage. It can be summoned again while this spell is in effect. The caster has a light mote of brilliance while this spell is active.
title: Fiber Optic Beam

value: Spell that creates a brilliant blast of sunlight in a 60 foot radius. It blinds enemies and causes significant radiant damage.
title: Radio Blast

value: Spell that allows the caster to take additional attacks with a rifle, shotgun, or pistol.
title: Quick Reload

value: Spell that creates a harmful typographic glyph that can be set off by a specified trigger as a trap. It can cause necrotic damage, cause targets to argue with themselves, frighten/incapacitate/sleep/stun them.
title: Marker

value: Spell that causes the creature to be charmed and must move as close as possible to the caster.
title: Catfish

value: Spell that causes psychic damage. The target then has difficulty maintaining concentration.
title: Neurology

value: Spell that creates a replicator device. The caster can then reach in to receive a common or uncommon medical syringe.
title: Replicator

value: Spell that causes the target to go prone and laugh uncontrollably.
title: Meme

value: Spell that allows the caster to move objects or creatures with their mind.
title: Magnetic Attraction

value: Spell that allows the caster to speak telepathically with willing targets of their choosing, instantly sending images, words, sounds, and other sensory messages.
title: Transponder

value: Spell that instantly transports the caster and up to eight other creatures at once. The target location must be known by the caster or it may result in a mishap of some kind.
title: Teleporter

value: Spell that allows the caster to draw a circle on the ground. This circle is linked with a permanent circle created in another location allowing for transportation.
title: Transporter

value: Spell that creates a simple floating disc that can move creatures or objects. It follows the caster.
title: Hover Board

value: Spell that causes the target to have altered eyes or a booming voice. It can also play with fire, open a door or window dramatically, create a sound, or cause harmless tremors.
title: Audio Filter

value: Spell that creates a chain that causes bludgeoning damage.
title: Block-Chain

value: Spell that creates a loud boom that causes thunder damage that damages each creature within 5 feet.
title: Concussive Round

value: Spell that adds lightning damage to your attack and amplifies the attack's effectiveness.
title: Electrical Hack

value: Spell that creates a wave of force that thrusts everything within a short range in front of you away. This can push friend and foe alike, causing them to topple over.
title: Brain Wave

value: Spell that stops the flow of time for everyone except the caster. The caster can take any actions during this short period, however any actions that affect another creature end the time stop.
title: Chrono Trigger

value: Spell that allows the caster to point at a creature which will then hear a digital beep. It will take necrotic damage and more so if it is already damage.
title: System Beep

value: Spell that grants a creature that the caster can touch the ability to understand all spoken or signed languages. They can also be understood by any creatures that know a language.
title: Dual Lingo

value: Spell that allows creatures to enter a large server and allow them to exit another server elsewhere. The caster must have seen or touched this place before.
title: Transport via Computers

value: Spell that allows the caster to enter a computer and exit a similar one within 500 feet.
title: Electrical Wire Transmission

value: Spell that allows the caster to select a target which will be transformed into another kind of creature. It can also transform objects into creatures and creatures into objects.
title: True Nanomorph

value: Spell that resurrects a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years. The spell fully heals, cures, and regrows missing limbs.
title: Cellular Reconstruction

value: Spell that gives the target true sight, which sees through illusion, darkness, and invisibility.
title: Thermal Imaging

value: Spell that allows the caster to attack with a weapon, but their accuracy and damage is based on their technical ability.
title: Auto Aim

value: Spell that creates a wall of water that can up to 300 feet tall. It causes significant bludgeoning damage.
title: Tidal Lock

value: Spell that creates an invisible force that performs simple tasks. It cannot attack or do any heavy lifting.
title: Nano Servants

value: Spell that causes necrotic damage. The caster regains half of the damage as health.
title: Transfusion

value: Spell that insults the target with a barrage of abusive language and subtle enchantments. If it can hear you, it will receive psychic damage and will be at a disadvantage for the next attack.
title: Laugh Track

value: Spell that launches a sabot round filled with acid at an enemy, causing incredible acid damage.
title: Anti-Material Round

value: Spell that creates a wall of fire that damages any enemies moving through it from a single side.
title: Firewall

value: Spell that creates an invisible wall of force that prevents creatures, projectiles, and spells from passing through it.
title: Code Blocks

value: Spell that creates a wall of ice that causes significant cold damage to enemies that touch it initially. It can be destroyed, but leaves behind frigid air that continues to damage enemies.
title: Cold Fusion Wall

value: Spell that creates a wall of stone that can also be shaped to imprison creatures.
title: Metal Wall

value: Spell that creates a wall of tangled razor wire. It causes piercing and slashing damage to creatures trying to pass through it. It is difficult to pass through.
title: Razor Wall

value: Spell that creates a mystical connection between the caster and another creature. The creature has additional defense and resistance to all damage.
title: Shield Link

value: Spell that allows a number of creatures to be able to breath underwater for a time.
title: Respirator

value: Spell that allows a number of creatures to be able to walk over the surface of liquids harmlessly.
title: Hydrophobic Step

value: Spell that shoots a mass of webs at a point, causing the terrain to be difficult to pass through. Any creatures caught in the web are restrained.
title: Sticky Bomb

value: Spell that creates visions of terrible things in a target's mind. This affects targets within a 30 foot radius. They take extreme psychic damage and continues to take damage while they are frightened.
title: Censorship

value: Spell that allows a number of creatures to activate wing suits and traverse great distances with ease.
title: Base Jumping

value: Spell that creates a vortex of wind in any shape that makes a continuous path. It causes bludgeoning damage to creatures and pushes light creatures and missiles away.
title: Oxygen Canister

value: Spell that grants a single wish to caster. This is typically in the form of another spell casted for free. However, it can be casted to do anything, but with a chance of weakening the caster or removing their ability to ever make another wish again.
title: AI Prompt

value: Spell that creates a sustained arc of lightning between the caster and the target. It causes constant lightning damage, but requires the user to concentrate on the spell. The spell is broken when the caster is injured or loses concentration in any way.
title: Power Coupling

value: Spell that creates a burning radiance that causes radiant damage.
title: Night Light

value: Spell that transports a number of creatures and the caster to a location previously designated as a sanctuary.
title: Total Recall

value: Spell that causes additional necrotic damage to an attack.
title: Angry Emote

value: Spell that causes psychic damage whenever a creature enters ten feet from the caster.
title: Psycho Emitter

value: Spell that creates a range of fifteen feet that any creatures within cannot speak a deliberate lie.
title: Truth Serum

value: A trading card game passed down through the generations. The magical cards are rare and have incredible value. Players use the cards to have friendly battles.
title: Stragedy Card Game

value: Sends all cards that have the number that this card is played on to the discard pile.
title: Stragedy Ace Card

value: Sends the targeted card back to the discard pile. The player can then draw a card from the discard pile and take another turn.
title: Stragedy Jack Card

value: Your opponent must discard 5 cards from their draw pile.
title: Stragedy Brigand Card

value: Increases the total of the numbered card that this is placed on to get a score of 30. It cannot subtract points if you bust, however.
title: Stragedy Joker Card

value: Doubles the value of the numbered card that this is played on both sides of the battlefield.
title: Stragedy King Card

value: Prevents the numbered card that this is played on from causing you to bust. It subtracts down to 30.
title: Stragedy Priest Card

value: Removes the value of the numbered card that this is played on and adds it to the opponent.
title: Stragedy Queen Card

value: Forces the opponent to play a card directly from their draw pile or a random one chosen from their hand. If it can't be played, they must discard their hand.
title: Stragedy Witch Card

value: The Nano-Necrotic Virus is thought to be a super soldier serum that has mutated and transforms people into undead killing machines. The original intent may have been to create a stronger, faster soldier capable of healing his wounds rapidly. Instead, when the victim reaches brain death, the body continues to survive and is reduced to their most basic instincts of hunting and killing. The virus is transmitted by blood and saliva contact. Transformation could take days, making detection difficult and helps it spread like wild-fire.
title: Nano-Necrotic Virus

value: The VTOL, or Vertical Takeoff and Landing aircraft, uses anti-gravity plates instead of traditional rotors. These plates create a localized gravity field, allowing the VTOL to hover and maneuver with unmatched agility. Originally designed for military use, it now serves as a versatile transport for both civilians and soldiers. The anti-gravity plates also enable silent flight, making the VTOL an ideal choice for stealth missions. They are armed with machine guns, rocket pods, and a variety of onboard sensors. They are capable of autonomous flight.
title: VTOL
